dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 1392 IH: National Flood Insurance Program Extension Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Davidson introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To reauthorize the National Flood Insurance Program through December 31, 2024.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the National Flood Insurance Program Extension Act of 2023.

section.header: Reauthorization of National Flood Insurance Program

subsection.text: Section 1309(a) of the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968 (42 U.S.C. 4016(a)) is amended by striking September 30, 2022 and inserting December 31, 2024.
Section 1319 of the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968 (42 U.S.C. 4026) is amended by striking September 30, 2022 and inserting December 31, 2024.
If this Act is enacted after September 30, 2023, the amendments made by subsections (a) and (b) shall take effect as if enacted on September 30, 2023.
